meanings.definition: Washed with stones to create a faded or worn appearance.
meanings.sent1: The stonewashed jeans had a cool, vintage vibe.
meanings.sent2: She loved the stonewashed denim jacket for its unique style.
meanings.sent3: The stonewashed shirt looked like it had been on many adventures.
meanings.sent4: The stonewashed walls of the old castle held stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The stonewashed effect on the fabric gave it a timeless appeal.

meanings.definition: A fabric or garment that has been treated with stones to achieve a faded look.
meanings.sent1: The stonewashed fabric felt soft and comfortable against her skin.
meanings.sent2: He preferred stonewashed shirts for their casual yet stylish appearance.
meanings.sent3: The stonewashed jeans seemed to whisper tales of outdoor adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her stonewashed dress stood out among the crowd with its unique texture.
meanings.sent5: The stonewashed effect on the garment gave it a relaxed and lived-in feel.
